short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to modify HTML on lovethework.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free love (the work). Read the credits for work that you've paid to enter, and load in the case films from elsewhere, on the site that should be a celebration of the best work in the business.
